description.value: When you drink this potion, you gain the "enlarge" effect of the Enlarge/Reduce|XPHB spell for 10 minutes (no Concentration|XPHB required). The red in the potion's liquid continuously expands from a tiny bead to color the clear liquid around it and then contracts. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.

_srdData.name: Potion of Growth
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the "enlarge" effect of the {@spell Enlarge/Reduce|XPHB} spell for 10 minutes (no {@status Concentration|XPHB} required).
The red in the potion's liquid continuously expands from a tiny bead to color the clear liquid around it and then contracts. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.
